mapper.sql: a.apply_num AS "applyNum", a.match_sub_num AS "matchSubNum", a.fast_slow AS "fastSlow", a.trans_date AS "transDate", a.trans_capacity AS "transCapacity", a.blood_type AS "bloodType", a.operator AS "operator", a.unit AS "unit", a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_blood_capacity a
a.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_blood_capacity( apply_num, match_sub_num, fast_slow, trans_date, trans_capacity, blood_type, operator, unit, id, org_id, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date ) VALUES ( #{applyNum}, #{matchSubNum}, #{fastSlow}, #{transDate}, #{transCapacity}, #{bloodType}, #{operator}, #{unit}, #{id}, #{orgId}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_blood_capacity SET apply_num = #{applyNum}, match_sub_num = #{matchSubNum}, fast_slow = #{fastSlow}, trans_date = #{transDate}, trans_capacity = #{transCapacity}, blood_type = #{bloodType}, operator = #{operator}, unit = #{unit}, org_id = #{orgId}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
